title: How to Make a Peanut Butter and Jelly Smoothie

methods.name: Basic Peanut Butter and Jelly Smoothie

steps.headline: Blend together the banana, milk, and strawberries.
steps.description: In an electric blender on high speed, blend the three ingredients together until the banana and strawberries are mashed in with the milk.

steps.headline: Add the ice cubes.
steps.description: Blend the mix again until ice cubes are crushed.

steps.headline: Scoop in the peanut butter and blend once more.
steps.description: Mix until the smoothie reaches your desired consistency.

steps.headline: Pour the smoothie into two tall glasses.
Serve.
steps.description: Drizzle over extra peanut butter on the smoothie, if desired. Drink it through a straw and enjoy!

methods.name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Protein Smoothie

steps.headline: Blend together the banana, milk, and berries.
steps.description: In an electric blender on high speed, blend the three ingredients together until the banana and berries are mashed in with the milk.

steps.headline: Add the protein powder and oats.
steps.description: Blend again until the mix is smooth.

steps.headline: Scoop in the peanut butter and blend once more.
steps.description: Mix until the smoothie has reached your desired consistency.

steps.headline: Pour the smoothie into two tall glasses.
Serve.
steps.description: Drizzle over extra peanut butter on the smoothie, if desired. Drink through a straw and enjoy!

methods.name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Date Smoothie

steps.headline: Blend together the banana, milk, and blueberries.
steps.description: In an electric blender on high speed, blend the three ingredients together until the banana and berries are mashed in with the milk.

steps.headline: Add the dates.
steps.description: Blend again until the dates are smooth.

steps.headline: Scoop in the peanut butter and blend once more.
steps.description: Mix until the smoothie has reached your desired consistency.

steps.headline: Pour the smoothie into two tall glasses.
Serve.
steps.description: Drizzle over extra peanut butter on the smoothie, if desired. Drink with a straw and enjoy!

methods.name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Green Smoothie

steps.headline: Blend together the milk, berries, and greens.
steps.description: In an electric blender on high speed, blend the three ingredients together until the berries and greens are mashed in with the milk.

steps.headline: Add the yogurt and ice cubes.
steps.description: Blend again until the ingredients are well-blended.

steps.headline: Scoop in the peanut butter and blend once more.
steps.description: Mix until the smoothie is at your desired consistency.

steps.headline: Pour the smoothie into two tall glasses.
Serve.
steps.description: Drizzle over extra peanut butter on the smoothie, if desired. Drink with a straw and enjoy!

methods.name: Peanut Butter and Blackberry Jelly Smoothie

steps.headline: Blend together the milk, banana, and jelly.
steps.description: In an electric blender on high speed, blend the three ingredients together until the jelly and banana are combined in with the milk.

steps.headline: Add the honey.
steps.description: Blend again until well-blended.

steps.headline: Scoop in the peanut butter and blend once more.
steps.description: Mix until the smoothie is at your desired consistency.

steps.headline: Pour the smoothie into two tall glasses.
Serve.
steps.description: Drizzle over extra peanut butter on the smoothie, if desired. Drink with a straw and enjoy!

text: Basic Peanut Butter and Jelly Smoothie Blend together the banana, milk, and strawberries. In an electric blender on high speed, blend the three ingredients together until the banana and strawberries are mashed in with the milk. Add the ice cubes. Blend the mix again until ice cubes are crushed. Scoop in the peanut butter and blend once more. Mix until the smoothie reaches your desired consistency. Pour the smoothie into two tall glasses.  Serve. Drizzle over extra peanut butter on the smoothie, if desired. Drink it through a straw and enjoy! Peanut Butter and Jelly Protein Smoothie Blend together the banana, milk, and berries. In an electric blender on high speed, blend the three ingredients together until the banana and berries are mashed in with the milk. Add the protein powder and oats. Blend again until the mix is smooth. Scoop in the peanut butter and blend once more. Mix until the smoothie has reached your desired consistency. Pour the smoothie into two tall glasses.  Serve. Drizzle over extra peanut butter on the smoothie, if desired. Drink through a straw and enjoy! Peanut Butter and Jelly Date Smoothie Blend together the banana, milk, and blueberries. In an electric blender on high speed, blend the three ingredients together until the banana and berries are mashed in with the milk. Add the dates. Blend again until the dates are smooth. Scoop in the peanut butter and blend once more. Mix until the smoothie has reached your desired consistency. Pour the smoothie into two tall glasses.  Serve. Drizzle over extra peanut butter on the smoothie, if desired. Drink with a straw and enjoy! Peanut Butter and Jelly Green Smoothie Blend together the milk, berries, and greens. In an electric blender on high speed, blend the three ingredients together until the berries and greens are mashed in with the milk. Add the yogurt and ice cubes. Blend again until the ingredients are well-blended. Scoop in the peanut butter and blend once more. Mix until the smoothie is at your desired consistency. Pour the smoothie into two tall glasses.  Serve. Drizzle over extra peanut butter on the smoothie, if desired. Drink with a straw and enjoy! Peanut Butter and Blackberry Jelly Smoothie Blend together the milk, banana, and jelly. In an electric blender on high speed, blend the three ingredients together until the jelly and banana are combined in with the milk. Add the honey. Blend again until well-blended. Scoop in the peanut butter and blend once more. Mix until the smoothie is at your desired consistency. Pour the smoothie into two tall glasses.  Serve. Drizzle over extra peanut butter on the smoothie, if desired. Drink with a straw and enjoy!
